tool_contract.description:
Generate a report for a Iso-Seq Classify run, given both primer-trimmed,
non-chimeric, full-length reads and a classify summary.

output_types.title: Iso-Seq Classification Report
output_types.description: Summary of classification results from pbtranscript

tool_contract.name: Transcript Classification

input_types.description: Reads in FASTA format, usually are full-length, non-chimeric, primer-trimmed reads produced by Iso-Seq classify.
input_types.title: Fasta reads

input_types.description: A summary produced by Iso-Seq Classify, e.g. classify_summary.json
input_types.title: Summary file
